channel.title: [317 PI] Weapon disappears on swing animation
channel.description:
My weapons appear correctly when i'm not fighting, but when i swing a scimitar or shoot bows they disappear during the animation.
Is this cache related or is there a fix for this?
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OoSG_eXYmxI[/youtube]

item.title: [317 PI] Weapon disappears on swing animation
item.dc:creator: @morot4 morot4
item.description:
@morot4 wrote:

(This is still not worked out)
Still unsolved, need help D:

Read full topic
item.source: [317 PI] Weapon disappears on swing animation

item.title: [317 PI] Weapon disappears on swing animation
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Unrecognized config errors mean you probably didn’t have support for the animations in the first place.

PM me your id and pass and I’ll see if I can’t help you get it working.

Read full topic
item.source: [317 PI] Weapon disappears on swing animation

item.title: [317 PI] Weapon disappears on swing animation
item.dc:creator: @morot4 morot4
item.description:
@morot4 wrote:

Basically, i replaced java files with the java files in the thread you linked, except for the last public int which i just added in stream.java

Now i get an error upon loading up the client upon loading configs

Sorry to have you help me so much sk8rdude
If you’d help a dumb fool out i could give you my teamviewer id and password

This source i have is the only good one i’ve found that has not crap combat and working skills

Read full topic
item.source: [317 PI] Weapon disappears on swing animation

item.title: [317 PI] Weapon disappears on swing animation
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“morot4, post:3, topic:547990”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=666896.msg4459282#msg4459282 date=1416677612]
I remember having the exact opposite problem with skilling animations. You could wield a weapon and mine a rock and you’d see both the pickaxe and weapon.

I fixed it with a new animation file:
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/515785-reupload-602-animations-gfx.html
[/quote]

Thanks mate, but isnt that 602 animations?
Would that work for 317?[/quote]
Yes. Plenty of 317 clients (including mine) have higher revision data loaded into them.

Read full topic
